rease.gui
Class ApplicationSettings

java.lang.Object
  rease.gui.ApplicationSettings

public class ApplicationSettings
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages the GUI settings like library path and paths to executables. These are necessary in order to actually generate the simulation environment.

Version:
1.0-developer version
Author:
Pascal Zschumme, Thomas Gamer
